meaningMnemonic: Inside this giant <radical>mouth</radical> is a <radical>person</radical>, trapped, because they're a <kanji>criminal</kanji>. They did something bad (they touched the mouth of another person without consent) and now they're in mouth jail for criminals.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>criminal</kanji> is only wearing <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう). They're completely naked otherwise. They have to wear shoes because the mouth jail would be too slippery for them to stand otherwise.
